name: 16Bit Baking
description:
A small prototype. It's a fast pased baking 16bit baking game

- Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move

E - Interact

- How to play?

Craft items together on empty counters, just put down one of the ingredients on the counter using the interact key, grab another one and interact with the same counter again. Remember that for successful crafting, you need to have the right ingredients.

For some actions, like cooking in the oven or muffin lining you'll need to hold an item while interacting with a station.

Your orders will appear semi transparent. If you have a dish that matches one of the orders, walk up to the order table and interact with it whilst holding said dish.
